<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="">
[Shroud of Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=851)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 74

**Bloodline**
[Phoenix](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=15)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 10-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You encircle yourself in an aura of protective flames. Each creature that hits you with an unarmed attack, [Grapples](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) you, or otherwise touches you takes 3 fire damage. When you Cast the Spell and the first time you sustain it each round, each creature in the area takes 3d6 fire damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage caused by touching you increases by 1, and the fire damage when you Cast the Spell or sustain it increases by 1d6.
name: Shroud of Flame
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 74
